nodes.bodyText:
You are right, @daniel-beck . Thanks!
Although I'm testing it further and the position attribute change seems unnecessary here. Will post a new comment.

Hello @romenrg , thanks for the suggestion! The reason why I set position to 'absolute' is that if there's something in the foldable block, there will reserve an empty space. See demo

So I change the position to 'absolute' to clear the empty space.

I see, @benebsiny . Thank you for the explanation!
Then ignore my suggestion of removing the position attribute change. Just maybe consider the previous comment of using "static" instead of the "", although that's not a big deal.
I've update. Have a look at it.
